lead_paragraph: Steroids-tainted stars Manny Ramirez and Ivan Rodriguez are on baseball's Hall of Fame ballot for the first time along with Vladimir Guerrero.

headline.print_headline: Tainted Ramirez, Rodriguez on Hall Ballot With Guerrero
headline.main: Tainted Ramirez, Rodriguez on Hall Ballot With Guerrero
